column5: St Dave's Diner burnt to the ground around 11:30 pm last night...no cause reported yet...strange seeing as how they close around 03:00pm in the afternoon...  Big Cliff introduced the diner to Maribeth and me shortly after we moved up this way...we will miss their great food...
They did make a post on FB (St Dave's folks) but no clue since.  They intend to rebuild ASAP as per what I was reading.
The eggsmart in caygeon is.pretty good there beans

I watched it burn,and was there for over an hour....was quite the site from the tim hortons parking lot !!!! some of the social media sites were using a few of my pictures......glad nobody was hurt....
The eggsmart in caygeon is.pretty good there beans  You're right Ernie...haven't been there for a while...We were kinda regulars when they first opened...
Dave and Mariska will rebuild from what I hear.

Beans, try out the Durham Cafe. Another wonderful place to eat in the interm.  From what I understand one firefighter was hurt; burned wrist or hand.  I was told that the fire started in the kitchen but I thought there was a sprinkler system in the kitchen. I wonder if it malfunctioned or something.
Mistos is also another option. It's where St. Dave's used to be.

Lots of decent places in Lindsay for brekky Durham already mentioned is good Jane's country kitchen on Kent Judys place across from bmo on William st. The airport restraunt is good Smittys ok but pricy Several places in caygeon Embers lock32 mcdoos the coffee place and of course Tim hortons
